channel.title: Burger Beef on The Ulampinoy Project
channel.description: Recent content in Burger Beef on The Ulampinoy Project

item.title: Burger Steak Rice
item.description: We love burgers! If you have meat between those buns why not with rice? And if it has to be a rice topping it needs to have sarsa (sauce). This is why burger steak is a perfect ulam! The burger patties were prepared with a bit more of spices than the usual for hamburgers. It is loaded with garlic and a loads of ground black pepper. Adding up these will make it more connected as a rice topping.
